verbs.description: U.S. President Donald Trump 's top economic adviser Larry Kudlow [V: was] discharged from a Washington - area hospital on Wednesday , two days after he suffered a heart attack .

[ARG1: U.S. President Donald Trump 's top economic adviser Larry Kudlow] was [V: discharged] [ARG2: from a Washington - area hospital] [ARGM-TMP: on Wednesday] , [ARGM-TMP: two days after he suffered a heart attack] .
U.S. President Donald Trump 's top economic adviser Larry Kudlow was discharged from a Washington - area hospital on Wednesday , two days after [ARG0: he] [V: suffered] [ARG1: a heart attack] .
